org.pipservices.container.refer

Class ReferencesDecorator

  • java.lang.Object
    • org.pipservices.container.refer.ReferencesDecorator
  • All Implemented Interfaces:
    org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
    Direct Known Subclasses:
    BuildReferencesDecorator, LinkReferencesDecorator, ManagedReferences, RunReferencesDecorator

    public class ReferencesDecorator
extends Object
implements org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
    Chainable decorator for IReferences that allows to inject additional capabilities such as automatic component creation, automatic registration and opening.
    See Also:
    IReferences

        public void put(Object locator,
                Object component)
         throws org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        Puts a new reference into this reference map.
        Specified by:
        put in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Parameters:
        locator - a locator to find the reference by.
        component - a component reference to be added.

      • remove

        public Object remove(Object locator)
              throws org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        Removes a previously added reference that matches specified locator. If many references match the locator, it removes only the first one. When all references shall be removed, use removeAll() method instead.
        Specified by:
        remove in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Parameters:
        locator - a locator to remove reference
        Returns:
        the removed component reference.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        See Also:
        removeAll(Object)

      • removeAll

        public List<Object> removeAll(Object locator)
                       throws org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException
        Removes all component references that match the specified locator.
        Specified by:
        removeAll in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Parameters:
        locator - the locator to remove references by.
        Returns:
        a list, containing all removed references.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.errors.ApplicationException

      • getRequired

        public List<Object> getRequired(Object locator)
                         throws org.pipservices.commons.refer.ReferenceException
        Gets all component references that match specified locator. At least one component reference must be present. If it doesn't the method throws an error.
        Specified by:
        getRequired in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Parameters:
        locator - the locator to find references by.
        Returns:
        a list with matching component references.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.refer.ReferenceException - when no references found.

      • find

        public List<Object> find(Object locator,
                         boolean required)
                  throws org.pipservices.commons.refer.ReferenceException
        Gets all component references that match specified locator.
        Specified by:
        find in interface org.pipservices.commons.refer.IReferences
        Parameters:
        locator - the locator to find a reference by.
        required - forces to raise an exception if no reference is found.
        Returns:
        a list with matching component references.
        Throws:
        org.pipservices.commons.refer.ReferenceException - when required is set to true but no references found.

      • find

        public <T> List<T> find(Class<T> type,
                        Object locator,
                        boolean required)
                 throws org.pipservices.commons.refer.ReferenceException

        Returns:
        a list with matching component references.
